text:
GRAIL | Machine Learning, Quality Engineer, Project Manager, UI Designer | Menlo Park, CA, | Onsite | https://grail.com

GRAIL is a life sciences company whose mission is to detect cancer early when it can be cured. GRAIL is using high-intensity sequencing, population-scale clinical trials, and state of the art software engineering and data science to develop blood tests for early-stage cancer detection.

ML Engineer: https://goo.gl/R5SLei Product Manager: https://goo.gl/merQEt Quality Engineer: https://goo.gl/UP77fo Project Manager: https://goo.gl/Nv8t6y

UI Designer, please email jscalisi@grail.com
